name: Paralight (Mistiare, KalvinMalloch, thomasoleary, JacobPoole, _/> junior, TootieKutie, Merry, Andrei_Pantilie)
name_original: Paralight (Mistiare, KalvinMalloch, thomasoleary, JacobPoole, _/> junior, TootieKutie, Merry, Andrei_Pantilie)
description:
Paralight is a Co-Op Puzzle Adventure game where players choose between Sana or Ari, and work together to get back home. After crash landing onto a mysterious new planet, the two players must use their unique abilities cooperatively to traverse their new environment. While moving obstacles, levitating, or grappling, players will discover awe-inspiring forests covered in bioluminescence.

  • Explore a vibrant new world!
  • Co-operate with a friend to solve puzzles
  • Interact with cute creatures and dormant behemoths

As Ari:

Move Forward - W                                           Jump - Spacebar

Move Backward - S                                          Aim/Look - Mouse

Strafe Left - A                                             Aim/Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Strafe Right - D                                 Switching Equipment - Mouse Wheel

As Sana: 

Move Forward - W                                           Jump - Spacebar

Move Backward - S                                          Leivtate - Hold Spacebar

Strafe Left - A                                                    Aim/Look - Mouse

Right - D                                                  Telekinesis - Right Mouse Button

Bogomil Petrov – System Designer and Programming Assistance

A Leaf Sheep game
